description:
Non material minor admendment of planning permission P101604 dated 9 November 2010 for the Alterations and extensions to St Luke's community Centre building including replacement of windows, lowering of window cills, new window openings, new doors, extension of the lift shaft with associated lift overrun and new roof lights. the Amendments are:
-	East elevation Omission of previously proposed lowering of 4 cills to windows and insertion of 1 window on first floor 
-	North elevation Omission of 1 previously proposed roof light, omission of lowering of cills on first floor, reduced size of 4 rooflights previously proposed. Window infilled and cill dropped to accommodate new door on ground floor. Infilling of new fanlight on ground floor.  Infilling of vent opening on roof. Addition of spandrels, addition of 1 velux, previously approved lift over-run extended 
-	South elevation Handing of previously approved door created by lowering of cill on ground floor to other side.  1 new rooflight.  Reduced size of 1 approved rooflight.  Change from previously approved large single rooflight to three smaller rooflights.  Omission of previously approved lowering of cills on ground and first floor. Removal of external concrete stairs and raising and creation of new door opening and infilling of window on first floor.  Infilling of vent opening on roof. Rendering of damaged brickwork
-West elevation Omission of roof link previously approved. Infilling of vent opening. .Infilling of upper fanlight of 2 windows on first floor.
